content: I totally agree with the sentiment but this makes it sound so blase to get a job you love. POOF and the end of the day its the same truth, but for the state of the audience you are speaking to (people who are not already on the positive side of the fence), this is glibly dismissive in an privileged sort of way. I completely agree and if I had to guess you were not remotely implying its easy. If two years ago i had read that i would’ve immediately left and been furious. “Oh really? just get a job I like huh?” I now understand the fruitlessness of that kind of thinking but I worry of someone reading that and getting discouraged as I was. I don’t know, i’m not even sure why i’m leaving this long of a post on a strangers blog. Despite what i’ve said i really liked your article.
